sentences.en: Coconut is a basic ingredient for many curries.
sentences.cn: 椰子是多种咖喱菜的基本成分。

sentences.en: Coconut milk has little nutritive value.
sentences.cn: 椰子汁没什么营养价值。

sentences.en: Coconut Rice Balls is a Creole dish.
sentences.cn: 椰丝粉团是一道克里奥尔菜。

sentences.en: Even the coconut trees seemed swollen and expectant.
sentences.cn: 连椰子树都似乎憋得头昏脑胀,巴望能舒上一口气.

sentences.en: Four bottles of coconut milk, please!
He was eating a slice of coconut.
INGREDIENTS: Wheat flour , Meat Floss , Sugar , Egg, Coriander Leaf , Coconut Milk.
sentences.cn: 配料: 面粉.肉丝.白糖.蛋.芫 粞.椰浆. 黑芝麻.

sentences.en: large tropical gardens of coconut palms
That accounts for the milk in the coconut.
The coconut palm is a native of Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 椰子树原产于马来西亚。

sentences.en: The coconut palm trees planted after the war added to the beauty of the city.
sentences.cn: 战后栽植的这些椰子树使这个城市显得更加美丽.

sentences.en: The falling coconut gave him a terrific bang on the head.
sentences.cn: 那只掉下的椰子砰地击中他的脑袋.

sentences.en: The husk of this coconut is particularly strong.
sentences.cn: 椰子的外壳很明显非常坚固。

sentences.en: Then I tried a blend of half coconut milk and half water.
sentences.cn: 然后呢,我又试着将五成椰奶五成清水混合一下.

sentences.en: Uiliami blew the whistle suspended on his broad bare chest by a cord of coconut fiber.
sentences.cn: 尤利亚米吹响了哨子,这哨子穿在一根椰毛捻的绳子上,挂在他宽阔裸露的胸前.

sentences.en: We've got tea, coffee, beer, coconut milk, orange juice and Coca Cola.
sentences.cn: 有茶, 咖啡, 啤酒, 椰汁, 桔汁和可乐.

phrases.tran_cn: 椰子软糖；椰浆；椰子奶油

trans.tran_en: the large brown seed of a tropical tree, which has a hard shell containing white flesh that you can eat and a milky liquid that you can drink
